mapper.select: SELECT MID AS mid, MPW AS mpw, MNAME AS mname, MPHONE AS mphone, MEMAIL AS memail, MDATE AS mdate, MGRADE AS mgrade, "ROLE" AS role FROM USERS WHERE MID = #{mid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS ( "uId", MID, MPW, MNAME, MGENDER, MJUMIN, MPHONE, MCARRIER, MBIRTH, MEMAIL, MADDRESS, MDATE, MGRADE, MCOND ) VALUES ( SEQ_USERS.NEXTVAL, #{mid}, #{mpw}, #{mname}, #{mgender}, #{mjumin}, #{mphone}, #{mcarrier}, #{mbirth, jdbcType=DATE}, #{memail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, 'Family', '활동중' )
mapper.select: SELECT MID FROM USERS WHERE TRIM(MNAME) = TRIM(#{name}) AND REPLACE(MPHONE, '-', '') = #{phone}
